scripts.build:vendor: browserify js/vendor.jsx -t babelify --extension=.jsx -u react -g global-react -o dist/vendor.js
scripts.build:app: browserify js/app.jsx -d -t babelify --extension=.jsx -u react -g global-react -o dist/app.js
scripts.build:js: npm run build:vendor && npm run build:app
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:html && npm run copy
scripts.uglify:js: ls dist/*.js | grep -v global.react.js | xargs -I {} uglifyjs {} -c -o {}
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm run build:html:cdn && npm run uglify:js
